Dr. Sonya Garcia, MD

About

Dr. Garcia graduated from University of California at San Francisco. Dr. Sonya Garcia, MD is a Pediatrician in Oxnard, CA and has 25 years experience. Dr. Garcia currently practices at Practice and are affiliated with Ventura County Medical Center. Dr. Garcia's office accepts new patients.  Dr. Garcia also speaks Spanish. Dr. Garcia is board certified in Pediatrics and accepts multiple insurance plans.
